metadata.description: Have you heard of internet sensation and crazy nastyass the honey badger? It really doesn't give a s#!t. The most fearless critter on Earth will face off against...EVERYTHING! Birds, snakes, small childrenz, velociraptors, whatever! It'll fight anybody and anything and just smack the hell out of it. You should read this comic, 'cause it's badass, just like the honey badger.
metadata.name: Honey Badger
